akn:content.akn:p: The owner of an historic landmark or a contributing building or structure within an historic district shall comply with all laws and regulations governing the maintenance of real property. The buildings or structures shall be preserved against decay and deterioration and shall be made and kept free from structural defects through prompt correction of defects, such as:
An owner who fails to maintain a building or structure in compliance with this section shall be subject to the remedial requirements of ยง 6-1109.03 and the penalties under ยง 6-1110.
